alert.note: Alert for Randolph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Randolph County through 530 PM EDT... At 455 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Union City to 6 miles northwest of Fountain City. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Randolph County, including the following locations... Union City and Lynn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
